channel.title: I just started playing runescape again, what to do now?

item.title: I just started playing runescape again, what to do now?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:6, topic:343483”]Well you make something like 400 - 600gp per one you do (at least this is what I was getting when I did it a long time ago), plus you get the experience from cleaning the herb.
The trick is to use mouse keys so you can clean about 100 herbs a minute or more. Putting them in the vials is slower, but requires fuck all clicking. Basically when I did it, I had two monitors set up so I could watch movies as it finished putting the herbs into vials.[/quote]

Wow im not going to lie. Im considering my onboard graphics pretty powerful atm (ATI Radeon HD 4200). I have runescape running at highdetail full screen (1680x1050) on 20 inch monitor on vga. While I have a full hd movie running at a 21.5 inch monitor on hdmi at (1980x1020)

Read full topic
item.source: I just started playing runescape again, what to do now?

item.title: I just started playing runescape again, what to do now?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

Well you make something like 400 - 600gp per one you do (at least this is what I was getting when I did it a long time ago), plus you get the experience from cleaning the herb.
The trick is to use mouse keys so you can clean about 100 herbs a minute or more. Putting them in the vials is slower, but requires fuck all clicking. Basically when I did it, I had two monitors set up so I could watch movies as it finished putting the herbs into vials.

Read full topic
item.source: I just started playing runescape again, what to do now?

item.title: I just started playing runescape again, what to do now?
item.dc:creator: @mwiebelhaus mwiebelhaus
item.description:
@mwiebelhaus wrote:

[quote=“Lothy, post:3, topic:343483”]How much money do you have? You could turn water filled vials + ranarr weed into unfinished potions to make good money, provided you have capital to start. Once you get 10m cash, start flipping. Once you end up with 30 - 40m cash, consider high alching until 94+ (preferably 99) magic.

Once you do that, there’s a few choices:

  1. You could aim to max melee.
  2. You could max range and keep your melee stats as is.
  3. You could max range, max defence, keep attack and strength where they are (or get them to 70 70).[/quote]

Before I left I was doing herb farming and it was ok profit but ive wasted most of my money on cannonballs to get my range up to 70 quickly.[quote=“Lothy, post:3, topic:343483”]How much money do you have? You could turn water filled vials + ranarr weed into unfinished potions to make good money, provided you have capital to start. Once you get 10m cash, start flipping. Once you end up with 30 - 40m cash, consider high alching until 94+ (preferably 99) magic.

Once you do that, there’s a few choices:

  1. You could aim to max melee.
  2. You could max range and keep your melee stats as is.
  3. You could max range, max defence, keep attack and strength where they are (or get them to 70 70).[/quote]

Is doing to rannar + water vial more than just selling grimy rannars on the ge? Because im killing things atm that drop alot of herbs and I usually get alot of rannars per trip, which usually accounts for the cost of cannonballs.

Read full topic

item.title: I just started playing runescape again, what to do now?
item.dc:creator: @lothy Lothy
item.description:
@lothy wrote:

How much money do you have? You could turn water filled vials + ranarr weed into unfinished potions to make good money, provided you have capital to start. Once you get 10m cash, start flipping. Once you end up with 30 - 40m cash, consider high alching until 94+ (preferably 99) magic.

Once you do that, there’s a few choices:

  1. You could aim to max melee.
  2. You could max range and keep your melee stats as is.
  3. You could max range, max defence, keep attack and strength where they are (or get them to 70 70).

Read full topic
item.source: I just started playing runescape again, what to do now?

item.title: I just started playing runescape again, what to do now?
item.dc:creator: @Original_Daniel Original Daniel
item.description:
@Original_Daniel wrote:

I suggest quitting. Otherwise get your range to 85-90 so you can kill aviansies and make a few hundred k/hr. Then you can do mm for the dragon scimitar.

Read full topic
